verses.verse: Blessed <S%H835><s%> is he whose disobedience <S%H6588><s%> is forgiven, <S%H5375><s%> whose sin <S%H2401><s%> is covered. <S%H3680><s%>
Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H120><s%> to whom Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> doesn't <S%H2803><s%> impute iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> in whose spirit <S%H7307><s%> there is no deceit. <S%H7423><s%>
When I kept silence, <S%H2790><s%> my bones <S%H6106><s%> wasted away <S%H1086><s%> through my groaning <S%H7581><s%> all day long. <S%H3117><s%>

For day <S%H3119><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> was heavy <S%H3513><s%> on me. <S%H3955><s%> My strength was sapped <S%H2015><s%> in the heat <S%H2725><s%> of summer. <S%H7019><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

I acknowledged <S%H3045><s%> my sin <S%H2403><s%> to you. <S%H3680><s%> I didn't hide my iniquity. <S%H5771><s%> I said, <S%H559><s%> I will confess <S%H3034><s%> my transgressions <S%H6588><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and you forgave <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of my sin. <S%H2403><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

For this, <S%H2623><s%> let everyone who is godly pray <S%H6419><s%> to you in a time <S%H6256><s%> when you may be found. <S%H4672><s%> Surely when the great <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> overflow, <S%H7858><s%> they shall not reach to him. <S%H5060><s%>

You are my hiding place. <S%H5643><s%> You will preserve <S%H5341><s%> me from trouble. <S%H6862><s%> You will surround <S%H5437><s%> me with songs <S%H7438><s%> of deliverance. <S%H6405><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

I will instruct <S%H7919><s%> you and teach <S%H3384><s%> you in the way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H2098><s%> you shall go. <S%H3212><s%> I will counsel <S%H3289><s%> you with my eye on you. <S%H5869><s%>

Don't <S%H5483><s%> be like the horse, or like the mule, <S%H6505><s%> which have no understanding, <S%H995><s%> who <S%H5716><s%> are controlled <S%H1102><s%> by bit <S%H4964><s%> and bridle, <S%H7448><s%> or else <S%H1077><s%> they will not come near to you. <S%H7126><s%>
Many <S%H7227><s%> sorrows <S%H4341><s%> come to the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> but loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> shall surround <S%H5437><s%> him who trusts <S%H982><s%> in Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
Be glad <S%H8055><s%> in Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and rejoice, <S%H1523><s%> you righteous! <S%H6662><s%> Shout <S%H7442><s%> for joy, <S%H3477><s%> all you who are upright in heart! <S%H3820><s%>
